类 ProduceInfix

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProduceInfix

  • public class ProduceInfix
extends java.lang.Object

    This class can produce an random infix expression, it may be used for testing the Parser is correct, and compare the efficiency between Parser_Loop and Parser_Recursive

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      It produce a infix expression.
      static int getRandomNum()
      Produce a random digit.
      static char getRandomOpt()
      Produce a random operator, '+' or '-'.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ProduceInfix

        public ProduceInfix()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRandomInfix

        public static java.lang.String getRandomInfix(int length)

        It produce a infix expression.

        The expression satisfied the rule below :
        1. The operators only contain '+' and '-'.
        2. The operand is digit which means it only can be '0'-'9'.

        参数:
        length - : The length of output infix expression
        返回:
        : A infix expression which length is the parameter length.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - : while the length is even number.

      • getRandomNum

        public static int getRandomNum()

        Produce a random digit.

        返回:
        a digit is in the range '0'-'9'.

      • getRandomOpt

        public static char getRandomOpt()

        Produce a random operator, '+' or '-'.

        返回:
        : a character '+' or '-'.
